item.title: I Was a Sixth Grade Alien!
item.description:
I Was a Sixth Grade Alien! ðŸ”—

This entry focuses on the Canadian-British children’s science fiction comedy television series I Was a Sixth Grade Alien!, also known as My Best Friend is an Alien! in the UK and Australia. The series follows Pleskit, an extraterrestrial with purple skin, blue hair, and an antenna, as he tries to fit in and make friends in sixth grade. He befriends Tim, who is interested in space and aliens. Together, they navigate unusual problems, including a trans-universal portal game and a creature from Pleskit’s home planet. The show premiered on July 13, 1999, and ended on January 10, 2001. It was produced by Winklemania Productions and AAC Kids, with participation from various Canadian funding bodies. The series is based on Bruce Coville’s book series of the same name.

Episode listing ðŸ”—

This section indicates that the series consists of 39 episodes.

Season 1 (1999â€“2000) ðŸ”—

This section lists the episodes of the first season, including titles, directors, writers, and original air dates. Carl Goldstein and Bill Fleming are named as directors, and Sheri Elwood, Cameron Rothery, Derek Schreyer, and John Slama are named as writers. The first episode, “They Called Him Pleskit!”, aired on July 13, 1999, and the season includes episodes such as “Aliens to Blow Up Earth!”, “Alien Dinner Massacre!”, and “Attack of the 1000 Foot Veeblax!”.

Season 2 (2000â€“2001) ðŸ”—

This section lists the episodes of the second season. Some episode titles include “There’s an Alien in My Seat!”, “I Am Larrabe Hicks!”, “Bride of Pleskit!”, and “His Girlfriend Is an Alien!”. It notes that the episode “Escape from Zartopia!” was only shown on YTV in Canada.

References ðŸ”—

This section is a placeholder for references used in the article.

External links ðŸ”—

This section provides links to external resources related to the show, including its IMDb page, an episode guide at epguides.com, and a page on the Australian Broadcasting Corporation website.

Former YTV original programming ðŸ”—

This section is a template listing former original programming broadcast by YTV, including I Was a Sixth Grade Alien! and many other shows from the 1980s, 1990s, and 2000s. It also includes links to related topics such as current original series, Corus Entertainment, Nelvana, The Zone, Treehouse TV, Teletoon, and StackTV.

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/I_Was_a_Sixth_Grade_Alien!
